subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The free-agent running back Dominic Rhodes agreed to a two-year contact with the Bills, giving Buffalo an established starter while Marshawn Lynch opens next season serving a three-game suspension. Rhodes is an eight-year veteran who played last season with the Indianapolis Colts. In 15 games last season, Rhodes had 538 yards rushing and a team-leading 6 rushing touchdowns.
